div.p: Setup a display that let's others know when I'm actively working with somebody else. I want to provide an audio keyword "on" followed by "air" that sets the display status. Additionally if I forget to do this and there is voice activity for greater than a given time threshold (60 seconds to start) then I want the display to automatically be set.
